description.p: Extract the quarter number from a date or datetime value.
Returns the quarter number from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The Quarter function computes the quarter number from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: Quarter() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, Quarter(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|4
